mapper.select: select t1.id, t1.material_code, t1.device_type_code, t1.material_name,t2.base_type_code,t2.base_type_name,t2.id as base_type_id from device_compose t1 left join material_base_type t2 ON (t1.base_type_code = t2.base_type_name and t2.del_flag = 0) where t1.del_flag = 0 and device_type_code = #{deviceTypeCode} and t2.base_type_code is not NULL
